review: Easy to set up and connect whenever you want to watch a movie. Definitely would suggest getting this!!!
author: Masato Tsujimoto

review: the device does not connect to my internet service I will be returning it in a few days
author: carlton stroman

review: It didn't work for what I bought it for so I sent it back.  I really can't tell you if it works well or not.
author: HSM

review: great little gadget ..but you cannot stream Amazon prime on it..which really disappointed me...so if I had it to do over I would probably purchase the amazon fire media player instead.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Excellent product.  I can stream YouTube and Netflix and other media on my TV with my phone and computer.  Small enough to take with you while traveling as well.  You just need WiFi and an HDMI port
author: Chris

review: Works great just what I needed
author: Matthew D Ervin

review: I bought this for music only,for playing songs on my home stereo from my computer. I have it streaming to the tv, then optical out to home stereo. My complaint with this product is the music cuts out intermittently on about every other song. Just when your enjoying a song it will sound like a cell phone with bad reception. It has a screen saver which looks beautiful on a big screen which I love.
author: Kindle Customer

review: Love this little gadget.  It was easy to install and works a charm.
author: Barbara J. Geiger "bjgeiger"
